New Records: Shohei Ohtani hit his National League-leading 44th home run
Key Match Events: Ohtani, Mookie Betts and Freddie Freeman hit consecutive homers for the Dodgers to lead off the game
Tommy Edman broke a 6-6 tie with a two-run single in the top of the ninth inning
Pre-Game Insights: No pre-game insights provided in the article
Post-Match Reflections: No post-match reflections provided in the article
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the first game of a four-game set between the two teams
Others: The game took place at Chase Field in Phoenix, Arizona
